```{r}
library(RWeka)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

# 1. Dataset Retrieval

```{r}
sonar <- read.csv("sonar/sonar.all-data")
```

# 2. Basic Classification

## C4.5 Classifier
```{r}
sonar.c45 <- J48(R ~ ., data = sonar)
summary(sonar.c45)
sonar.c45.confusionMatrix <- summary(sonar.c45)$confusionMatrix
```

Accuracy, Mean Error, precision, recall, f-score

## Cross-validation
```{r}
sonar.c45.10fold <- evaluate_Weka_classifier(sonar.c45, numFolds = 10)
sonar.c45.10fold
#sonar.c45.10fold.confusionMatrix <- evaluate_Weka_classifier(sonar.c45, numFolds = 10)$confusionMatrix
```

Accuracy, Mean Error, precision, recall, f-score

# 3. Other Classifiers

## Random Forest

```{r}
RF <- make_Weka_classifier("weka/classifiers/trees/RandomForest")
sonar.randomForest <- RF(R ~ ., data = sonar)
sonar.randomForest.10fold <- evaluate_Weka_classifier(sonar.randomForest, numFolds = 10)
sonar.randomForest.10fold
```

## Support Vector Machine
```{r}
SVM <- make_Weka_classifier("weka/classifiers/functions/SMO")
sonar.supportVectorMachine <- SVM(R ~ ., data = sonar)
sonar.supportVectorMachine.10fold <- evaluate_Weka_classifier(sonar.supportVectorMachine, numFolds = 10)
sonar.supportVectorMachine.10fold
```

## Naive Bayes

```{r}
NB <- make_Weka_classifier("weka/classifiers/bayes/NaiveBayes")
sonar.naiveBayes <- NB(R ~ ., data = sonar)
sonar.naiveBayes.10fold <- evaluate_Weka_classifier(sonar.naiveBayes, numFolds = 10)
sonar.naiveBayes.10fold
```
